desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to 5 attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

desc.0: In the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</ct> state, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Spin continuously while spraying flames around, followed by a Finishing Move that inflicts <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>. Continuing to hold extends the flame-spraying duration.
desc.2: When the move is activated, it consumes 20 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>;
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
desc.4: After executing the Finishing Move, press <IconSpecialReady /> to immediately follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Perform a forward rush attack with the flamethrower, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Launch a series of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

SpecialAttackIntenseHeatAgingMethod.name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a fire blast forward, inflicting <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>;
desc.2: Press and hold <IconSpecial /> to charge, boosting the move's power.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackIntenseHeatStirringMethod.name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method

desc.0: With enough energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Continuously spray flames with a one-handed flamethrower, then release a fire blast in a straight line ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>. Continue holding to steadily consume energy and extend the spray's duration.
desc.2: While continuously spraying, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to execute a sidestep dodge, adjusting your position in the corresponding direction.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while continuously spraying, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable during sidestep dodge and fire blast.

EXSpecialAttackIntenseHeatStirringMethod.name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot

desc.0: While using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</ct>, with enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Use both flamethrowers to continuously spray flames, followed by a fire blast in a front line, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>. Keep holding to continue consuming Energy and extend the spray's duration.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable during the moment the spray is activated and during the activation of the fire blast.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while spraying, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Quickly dash forward while spraying flames in all directions, then launch a fire blast in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After using the skill, press <IconSpecialReady /> to immediately follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Dash forward quickly, then leap into the air and continuously spray flames over a wide area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When leaping into the air, a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> will be triggered. If the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is activated, Burnice will extend the duration of her flame spray.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a flurry of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Leap into the air and quickly spin forward while spraying flames in all directions, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After using the skill, press <IconSpecialReady /> to immediately follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>.

desc.0: When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct> for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>, she enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</ct> state until all <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct> is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>.
desc.1: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</ct> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, she applies the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</ct> effect to the target until she exits the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</ct> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</ct> status, it triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect, expending 8 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct> to deal <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>175%</ct> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <ct color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect is considered <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</ct> DMG.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character or shares the same Faction:
desc.1: When Burnice's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct> hits an enemy, or when the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <ct color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</ct> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <ct color=#FF5521>Burn</ct> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

1.name: Kindred Flames
1.desc: Increases the limit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct> from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated <ct color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</ct> from the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect is increased by 25%.

flavor.0: "Everyone has rough times; it's perfectly normal!"
flavor.1: "Cheer up, Caesar! How about a Nitro-Fuel special? I added a ton of sugar!"

2.name: Extra at No Additional Charge
2.desc: When triggering the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</ct> is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</ct>, up to a max of 20%.

flavor.0: As the mixologist for the Sons of Calydon, Burnice takes great pleasure in crafting the best Nitro-Fuel drinks in New Eridu for her friends.
flavor.1: Of course, if you happen to be her enemy... you might have the opportunity to try a new and unique flavor too.

3.name: Optimistic by Nature
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "That Burnice, she's always so full of energy! Even right after waking up! I have no idea where she gets all that energy..."
flavor.1: "What's even scarier is that she can get everyone around her to be just as enthusiastic! It's almost like she's some kind of monster!"
flavor.2: "But... I don't really dislike it, to be honest..."
flavor.3: — From a boar manager who wishes to remain unnamed

4.name: Ultimate Fuel Supply
4.desc: When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</ct> hits an enemy, the move's CRIT Rate increases by 30%. The max flame spray duration of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct> is increased by 1s.

flavor.0: "You like the drink I mixed? Thanks! Steeltusk likes them too~ That guy can drink 200 liters in one go!"
flavor.2: "Wanna try some of its special fuel? It's pretty fiery~"

5.name: Dance of Fire and Ice
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: When mixing drinks, ice is a crucial element.
flavor.1: Without an intense chill, the intense heat just doesn't stand out.
flavor.2: "That fusion of fire and ice~ It's truly captivating!"

6.name: Burning Invitation
6.desc: When Burnice hits an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>, it triggers an additional special <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK as <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> to the target. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume <ct color=#FFFFFF>Heat</ct>. After hitting an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>, while the move is active, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>, special <ct color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</ct> effects, and <ct color=#FF5521>Burn</ct> effects will ignore 25% of the target's <ct color=#FF5521>Fire RES</ct>. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</ct>'s fire blast hits an enemy, if that enemy is <ct color=#FF5521>Burned</ct>, trigger an additional instance of <ct color=#FF5521>Burn</ct> DMG equal to 1,800% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 20s for each target.

flavor.0: It seems like no one has ever seen Burnice truly angry.
flavor.1: "Trust me, you don't want to see it."
flavor.2: — From a driver getting ready to sleep atop Steeltusk
